Articles.Content:
Hi guys, I was just wondering if someone can build a LLL Dropship craft (airplane) to drop the Example craft "LLL Munar Rover". I want it to be quick.

(Pull up the LLL Munar Rover craft, and feel free to remove any of the radars on top)

Not sure what exactly you mean, however I do have a cargo plane that can carry it, here is a link. It is an older plane(not quite as polished) but 10 engines should so the job. Here is a link

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/36803-Air-6C-Big-Bird

Again it might not be what you wanted so sorry about that.
Can it hold a large rover, like without it falling out?
That should be an easy modification, just add some landing legs at the edge.
